Articles.Content: Thank you very much Darth! I will also post the link in the OP when the files are uploaded!
Ill send them to you first, as I probably made some mistakes assembling them.
Will you make the second stage of the Falcon 9 compatible with The Laztek Dragon cargo vehicle?
will there be a Delta 4 in this mod?

will there be a Delta 4 in this mod?

I think a Delta IV model has been made by Kart, and is awaiting texturing by another forum member. Not 100% sure on that, though

Ariane 5 and Ariane 6 are on your list too?

My favourite two ESA rockets.

Will you make the second stage of the Falcon 9 compatible with The Laztek Dragon cargo vehicle?

I don't recall right now what diameter LazTek made his Dragon and Falcon 9. If he made it real scale, or scaled it down for KSP, it shouldn't be a problem and match up just fine. I will make it real scale (Falcon diameter of 3.66m), and provide a real scale config, for compatibility with packs like US Probes.

will there be a Delta 4 in this mod?

Yes.

The whole development process of Delta IV is a bit...slow (my fault), and YANFRET, who offered texturing it, has much to do in RL...so. I will try to speed things up now. It's been in development for almost 5 months now.

Ariane 5 and Ariane 6 are on your list too?

My favourite two ESA rockets.

No, liquidhype already made those/is working on these two launchers in his mod, so, no need for me to make these two too. Just wasted time I could work on Delta's.

Ariane 5 and Ariane 6 are on your list too?

My favourite two ESA rockets.

The different Ariane 6 versions (A62, A64 & PPH) has been out for a while now. Ariane 5 ECA is almost ready for release. I'm not going to be rude and post any pictures on Kartoffelkuchens thread, so you can have a look at A5 here.

- - - Updated - - -

The whole development process of Delta IV is a bit...slow (my fault), and YANFRET, who offered texturing it, has much to do in RL...so. I will try to speed things up now. It's been in development for almost 5 months now.

Delta IV looks really good KK! Can't wait to have it in game

Honest question for KK. I know you've worked on the DIV for quite a while, and had plans to do the DIII since many components are the same or similar with both the DII and DIV. While Liquidhype does have a DIII, so are you going to complete the DIII as well KK or leave it be with liquidhype's?

I will make it too. I am waiting for noonespecial to finish his DCSS, which I'll be using for DIV and DIII. Once the required components are made (DCSS and RS-27 remake I am working on) I basically only have to shorten EELTT, add a 4m Fuel Tank on top of EELTT and finish the Interstage. That's all. GEM-46s with their decouplers are there, RS-27A is there, 4m Fairing will be there (I've already made that for Delta IV), DCSS will be there. So it's basically 1 and 1/2 parts to do, and that's not hard at all, when I have everything else it should take about 2 hours to get the tank and the interstage done.

I'll have all ULA rockets than, and that's one of my goals here. ^^
Having trouble getting the folder with the .crafts to zip properly. It's throwing "cannot find package list" errors. Ill send you the raw text over PM, Kartoffelkuchen.

KK, that's great to hear. I knew there wasn't much to do once the DIV was done, so like you've basically said, it's kind of a no brainer to complete the package with the DIII. Looking forward to it all.

I don't recall right now what diameter LazTek made his Dragon and Falcon 9. If he made it real scale, or scaled it down for KSP, it shouldn't be a problem and match up just fine. I will make it real scale (Falcon diameter of 3.66m), and provide a real scale config, for compatibility with packs like US Probes.

Yes.

http://i.imgur.com/5CFvywm.png

http://imageshack.com/a/img911/2464/igFsJo.jpg

The whole development process of Delta IV is a bit...slow (my fault), and YANFRET, who offered texturing it, has much to do in RL...so. I will try to speed things up now. It's been in development for almost 5 months now.

No, liquidhype already made those/is working on these two launchers in his mod, so, no need for me to make these two too. Just wasted time I could work on Delta's.

me = want = now... it looks great!!!

Any ETA for the Delta IV? I'd like to use it in a video

Ok I'll dig my log out, just give me a sec. The parts that show up are the Delta K turntable, the Delta K stage, Centuar, the whole Falcon 1 rocket. The Common core booster for Atlas and the Atlas fairings don't show up.
so none of the fairings decouple on any of the rockets. did i do something wrong and can it be fixed?
You must install Felbourn's Oldschool Fairing Plugin. The thread is linked in the OP, go to page 2 on hus thread and download the prerelease version and you'll be fine.
Ive got that as well, as when I take the folders OUT of game data, they're there.
Where is the RO config?
I think I found the issue. I have Active Texture Management installed

Just a short progress update:

I am improving (reworking) hardware from the existing Delta II for the coming Delta III. I've remade the GEM-46 SRM's, GEM-40s for normal Delta II to follow:

I am progressing nicely with the Falcon 9, RS-27 family rework still needs a bit time, but I am optimistic that it'll be finished soon!

So far from my side, luckily I have holidays now, this should speed things up a bit too.
Oh boy. Falcon, Delta II-III-IV oh my!
